data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Jonathan Betancourt (Queretaro) has received a yellow card from Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Queretaro.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 6, Goal! Pachuca have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Victor Davila.
Luis Chavez with an assist there.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 10, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Queretaro drive upfield and Daniel Cervantes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pachuca defender.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca's Felipe Pardo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 13, Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro needs to be cautious. Pachuca have an attacking throw-in.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 16, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Can Queretaro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pachuca's half?
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Pachuca.
Free kick Pachuca.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Pachuca throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 23, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Pachuca.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Kevin Escamilla is booked for the away team.
In the minute 31, Pachuca's Felipe Pardo is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Kevin Escamilla has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In Pachuca de Soto Queretaro drive forward through Daniel Cervantes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Pachuca pushes forward through Luis Chavez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alex Diego is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Kevin Ramirez replacing Jonathan Betancourt.
In the minute 42, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Erick Aguirre has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Omar Islas of Queretaro is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Can Queretaro capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 46, Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a second substitution, with Irving Zurita replacing Angel Sepulveda.
Pachuca make their first substitution with Rodrigo Salinas replacing Erick Aguirre.
Oscar Murillo for Pachuca has been booked by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez and receives a first yellow card.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 48, Play has been interrupted briefly in Pachuca de Soto to check on Felipe Pardo, who is grimacing with pain.
Pachuca's Felipe Pardo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 51, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Pachuca de Soto.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Miguel Herrera is replacing Oscar Murillo for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca drive forward but Kevin Alvarez is judged offside.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Pachuca.
The home team have replaced Roberto de la Rosa with Erick Sanchez. This is the third substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
In the minute 66, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Pachuca's Victor Davila breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a third substitution, with Gonzalo Montes replacing Omar Arellano.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to Queretaro's area.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 72, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Queretaro are coming forward and Irving Zurita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 73, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 78, Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kevin Alvarez (Pachuca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Antonio Figueroa replacing Victor Davila.
Kazim is on a sub for Victor Sosa for Pachuca.
Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 83, Queretaro are pushing forward but Kevin Ramirez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Julio Nava of Queretaro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 86, Pachuca will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Queretaro.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
The away team have replaced Julio Nava with Jonathan Perlaza. This is the fifth substitution made today by Alex Diego.
In the minute 88, Francisco Rivera is replacing Fernando Madrigal for Queretaro at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Queretaro.
Irving Zurita (Queretaro) has received a first yellow card.
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo and Gustavo Cabral gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Queretaro defence.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
